Heroin.name: Heroin
Heroin.description: Recently legalized substance with high sales tax. Very addictive but really calms the nerves.

Whiskey.name: Metal Flask of Whiskey
Whiskey.description: Strong Alcohol. Enhances the effects of other drugs, also useful for ingesting pills. Smells like the ABV is 50%

Coke.name: Coke
Coke.description: A single hit of coke in a small package. Makes one hyperactive.

Item.name: Crackrock
Item.description: Crack that needs to be smoked, Very potent..

Item.name: Oxycodone
Item.description: A single pill of Oxycodone, an Opiate.

Item.name: Diazepam
Item.description: A single pill of Diazepam, a Standard benzodiazepine. Used for Stress Relief.

Item.name: Morphine Tablet
Item.description: A single Tablet of Morphine, an Opiate. Used for pain relief.

Item.name: Adderall Pill
Item.description: A single Pill of Adderall , a Dextroamphetamine. Used to combat stress and improve workspeed.

Item.name: Bottle of Beer
Item.description: Weak Alcohol. Slightly Enhances the effects of other drugs, also useful for ingesting pills.

Item.name: Dramamine Tablet
Item.description: A single tablet of Dramamine, a Dimenhydrinate. Typically used for Nausea.

Item.name: Xanax
Item.description: A single pill of Xanax, a Strong benzodiazepine. Used for Anxiety and Stress Relief.

Item.name: Nicotine
Item.description: A single vial of Nicotine, Highly addictive. Used for Anxiety and Stress Relief.

Item.name: Fentanyl
Item.description: A single 1mg pill of Fentanyl, a Very strong expensive Opiate. Use with extreme caution.

Item.name: Naloxone Pills
Item.description: A single 2mg pill of Naloxone, used to reduce Opioid high and stop overdose.

Item.name: Modafinil Pills
Item.description: A single 100mg pill of Modafinil, used to wake up unresponsive patients.

Item.name: Epinephrine
Item.description: A single Shot of epinephrine, used to wake up unresponsive patients and provide a boost.
